quotes.quote: I never believed in Santa Claus because I knew no white dude would come into my neighborhood after dark.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: A turkey never voted for an early Christmas.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Do give books - religious or otherwise - for Christmas. They're never fattening, seldom sinful, and permanently personal.
quotes.author: Lenore Hershey

quotes.quote: Aren't we forgeting the true meaning of Christmas? You know, the birth of Santa.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when people of all religions come together to worship Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: I stopped believing in Santa Claus when my mother took me to see him in a department store, and he asked for my autograph.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.quote: At Christmas play and make good cheer, For Christmas comes but once a year.
quotes.author: Thomas Tusser
